## makeCustomTableRenderer() function

Create a table renderer from a custom `TableComponent`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function makeCustomTableRenderer(TableComponent: ComponentType<HTMLTableBaseProps>): RendererDeclaration;
```
